sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM Process.ProcessView WHERE SourceConnectionID = 1 AND LoadGroupID = @{pipeline().parameters.LoadGroupID} AND (TemplateName NOT IN ('INCR', 'DWHINCR', 'DWHPART') OR IncrementalLoad = 0) ORDER BY LoadPriority

SELECT @{item().SourceConnectionID} as HSO_DnA_SourceConnectionID, @{item().TargetMappingID} as HSO_DnA_TargetMappingID, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_InsertDateTime, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_UpdateDateTime, null as HSO_DnA_DeleteDateTime, @{item().FieldList} FROM @{item().SourceSchemaName}.@{item().SourceTableName}

SELECT * FROM Process.ProcessView WHERE SourceConnectionID = 1 AND LoadGroupID = @{pipeline().parameters.LoadGroupID} AND (TemplateName = 'INCR' OR TemplateName = 'DWHINCR') AND IncrementalLoad = 1 ORDER BY LoadPriority

activities.name: Materialize_Incr_Views
activities.description: Copy data from the on-premises source database to the matching cloud sink database

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT @{item().FieldList} FROM @{item().SourceSchemaName}.@{item().SourceTableName}  WHERE ModifiedDateTime >= DATEADD(DAY, -5, GETDATE())
SELECT * FROM Process.ProcessView WHERE SourceConnectionID = 1 AND LoadGroupID = @{pipeline().parameters.LoadGroupID} AND (TemplateName = 'FULL_ADD') AND IncrementalLoad = 0 ORDER BY LoadPriority

SELECT @{item().SourceConnectionID} as HSO_DnA_SourceConnectionID, @{item().TargetMappingID} as HSO_DnA_TargetMappingID, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_InsertDateTime, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_UpdateDateTime, null as HSO_DnA_DeleteDateTime, @{item().FieldList} FROM @{item().SourceSchemaName}.@{item().SourceTableName}

SELECT @{item().SourceConnectionID} as HSO_DnA_SourceConnectionID, @{item().TargetMappingID} as HSO_DnA_TargetMappingID, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_InsertDateTime, '@{pipeline().parameters.StartDateTime}' as HSO_DnA_UpdateDateTime, null as HSO_DnA_DeleteDateTime, @{item().FieldList} FROM @{item().SourceSchemaName}.@{item().SourceTableName}

SELECT * FROM Process.ProcessView WHERE SourceConnectionID = 1 AND LoadGroupID = @{pipeline().parameters.LoadGroupID} AND (TemplateName = 'FULL_ADD_EOMonth_Cur') AND IncrementalLoad = 0 ORDER BY LoadPriority

	 (TemplateName = 'INCR')

SELECT * 
	FROM process.ProcessView 
WHERE SourceConnectionID = 14 AND
	 (IncrementalLoad = 0  OR TemplateName = 'FULL')

query.value:
SELECT	@{item().SourceConnectionID} as HSO_DnA_SourceConnectionID,
		@{item().TargetMappingID} as HSO_DnA_TargetMappingID, 
		CURDATE() as HSO_DnA_InsertDateTime, 
		CURDATE() as HSO_DnA_UpdateDateTime, 
		@{item().FieldList}
FROM 
		@{item().SourceTableName}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH laatstesalesorder
AS (SELECT ProductBK,
           ISNULL(MAX(ConfirmationDate), NULL) dt
    FROM dbo.vwSalesOrderExplsion
    GROUP BY ProductBK),

--************************
aataldagengeleden
AS (SELECT s.ProductBK,
           DATEDIFF(DAY, GETDATE(), s.dt) dagen
    FROM laatstesalesorder s),

--***********************
invent
AS (SELECT --[LocationName],
        SUM(PhysicalInventory) PhysicalInventory,
        SUM(inv.PhysicalReservedQuantity) PhysicalReservedQuantity,
        SUM(inv.OnOrderQuantity) OnOrderQuantity,
        inv.DimProductBK
    FROM [dwh].FactAvailableQuantity inv
        LEFT JOIN dwh.DimLocation
            ON LocationBK = inv.DimLocationBK
    WHERE LEFT(DimLocationBK,3) = 'EIN'
          AND inv.InventStatus = 'available'
    GROUP BY inv.DimProductBK),
--***********************

InventCompleet
AS (
   --		sELECT * FROM invent WHERE  invent.DimProductBK LIKE 'WNL-04-F04V%'
   SELECT --[LocationName],
       SUM(PhysicalInventory) voorraad,
       SUM(inv.PhysicalReservedQuantity) reserved,
       SUM(inv.OnOrderQuantity) onorder,
       ISNULL(MAX(dagen), -5000) AS dagen,
       pr.ProductNumber,
       STRING_AGG(pr.ProductLifecycleState, ';') lifecycle
   FROM invent inv
       INNER JOIN dwh.DimProduct pr
           ON inv.DimProductBK = pr.ProductBK
       LEFT JOIN aataldagengeleden d
           ON d.ProductBK = pr.ProductBK
   --		LEFT JOIN dwh.DimLocation ON LocationBK=inv.DimLocationBK
   WHERE --pr.ProductNumber = 'WNL-04-F04V' AND 
       inv.PhysicalInventory + inv.PhysicalReservedQuantity + inv.OnOrderQuantity <> 0
   GROUP BY pr.ProductNumber),

--***********************
stockmovement
AS (SELECT [ITEMID] productnumber,
           DATEDIFF(DAY, MAX(DATEPHYSICAL), GETDATE()) lastmovement
    FROM [dbo].[HSOInventTransStaging]
    GROUP BY ITEMID),
--***********************
result AS (
SELECT voorraad = CAST(inv.voorraad AS INT),
       available = CAST(CASE
                            WHEN inv.voorraad - inv.reserved - inv.onorder < 0 THEN
                                0
                            ELSE
                                inv.voorraad - inv.reserved - inv.onorder
                        END AS INT),
       marker = CASE
                    WHEN (dagen * -1) < 365
                         OR ISNULL(stockmovement.lastmovement, 400) < 365 THEN
                        ' '
                    ELSE
                        CASE
                            WHEN inv.lifecycle LIKE '%SP-SR%' THEN
                                ' '
                            ELSE
                                'Y'
                        END
                END,
       inv.ProductNumber,
       (dagen * -1) dagen,
       CASE
           WHEN inv.lifecycle LIKE '%SP-SR%' THEN
               'SP-SR'
           ELSE
               ' '
       END lifecycle,
       stockmovement.lastmovement
FROM InventCompleet inv
    LEFT JOIN stockmovement
        ON stockmovement.productnumber = inv.ProductNumber)

--***********************

		SELECT CONCAT('15019,NL,',result.ProductNumber,',',result.voorraad,',',result.available,',', convert(varchar, getdate(), 112),',093001,',result.marker,',','0') AS [sep=,] 		FROM result

SELECT [OrderNumber],
       [OrderLineNo],
       IIF(unconfirmedBOM = 1, 'YES', 'NO') UncBOM
FROM [dwh].[vw_te_vervroegen_ordersV2]
WHERE unconfirmedBOM <> UnconfirmedBOMlines
      AND [unconfirmedBOM] IN ( 1, 0 );

SELECT 
      [workspaceGuid]
      ,[datasetGuid]
  FROM [audit].[RefreshBIModels] WHERE dwh='prd'  and active=1

SELECT 
      [workspaceGuid]
      ,[datasetGuid]
  FROM [audit].[RefreshBIModels] WHERE dwh='PRD'  and active=1
